#autogenerated orb_generator v1.0.0
#these are the QA tests

# {project_name}_spec.rb
require '{project_name}_client'

describe {project_name}_client, "#score" do
  it "returns 0 for all gutter game" do
    bowling = {project_name}_client.new
    20.times { bowling.hit(0) }
    bowling.score.should eq(0)
  end
end
